CustomField.description: The number of days before or after the Next Donation Date that NPSP won't create a new installment Opportunity if the next open Opportunity's Close Date is changed. Applies only to Recurring Donations where Installment Period is Monthly or Yearly.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days before or after the Next Donation Date that NPSP won't create a new installment Opportunity if the next open Opportunity's Close Date is changed. Applies only to Recurring Donations where Installment Period is Monthly or Yearly.
CustomField.label: Next Donation Date Match Range
